answers.answer: I was admitted in the hospital for high blood sugar level last week. I thought they will put me on insulin after monitoring. I did the diet they suggested. I cut down sugar and avoid food that contain starch. I have also started walking for about 30mins everyday. Yesterday i went to my app, my doctor said am doing fine and i just need to follow the diet. And yes my level is between 5.5 - 6.0

question: Have Gestational Diabetes, & Wouldent Mind Telling Me There Bloodsugar Levels ?! My Doctors Said Im Probably Going To Be Put On Insulin & I Dont See Why Considering My Level Are Never More Than 5 Above Or Below The Target Number ?!
title: Anybody Else ?
